content.raw:
Gazebo extending to full monitor width while height stays capped at some max, resulting in a ~2:1 aspect ratio, gets fairly annoying after some time when running on a big wide-screen monitor in my opinion. Maybe define a max width for the initial window size? Or maybe that's even a bug given that the height seems to be constrained while width isn't?

Actually the best alternative might be to store the resolution of the last session and use it for the initial size.
